message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. It's the fairest way to go.
Bob, time is running out and the value is decreasing. My offer is still on the table. Let's be reasonable.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than last time.  Let's split it closer to 60/40.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm compromising. Take this deal before inflation eats away at the value even more!
